## Software

### **ldmppr**

**ldmppr** is an R package containing a suite of tools for estimating, assessing model fit, simulating from, and visualizing location dependent marked point processes characterized by regularity in the pattern. [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/ldmppr/index.html) [GitHub](https://github.com/lanedrew/ldmppr)
